items.caption: Octuple thinning + final strong quadruple 3x5 correction

controls.name: diagonalThinning
controls.caption: Diagonal thinning
controls.description: Ignored for "Quadruple 3x5 thinning" and "Strong quadruple 3x5 thinning"

controls.name: topological
controls.caption: Topological mode
controls.description: Ignored for "Quadruple 3x5 thinning" and "Strong quadruple 3x5 thinning"

controls.name: maxNumberOfIterations
controls.caption: Maximal number of iterations
controls.description: Negative value means full skeletonization (it finishs when the image stops changing after new skeletonization step).

controls.name: numberOfAdditionalTopologicalIterations
controls.caption: Number of additional topological iterations
controls.description: If >0, this function performs the specified number of steps of the topological skeletonization at the final stage. It allows to shorten branches of the usual skeleton. Of course, this has no sense if the main skeletonization is topological ("Topological mode" flag).

controls.name: addBorder
controls.caption: Add border
controls.description: Add 1-pixel border before skeletonization. Can be useful in topological mode.
